organizations: Cottonwood Youth Basketball Cottonwood Youth Basketball
title: Cottonwood Youth Basketball
text: Cottonwood Youth Basketball (Photo by Vyto Starinskas) The City of Cottonwood Parks and Recreation department has now opened their registration for Youth Basketball. Registration will be open until Friday, October 23 at the Cottonwood Recreation Center. The Program is open to grades 1st through 9th. The registration fee for each child is $35 but there is a $5 discount for each additional child. All games and practices are played locally with practices beginning the week of November 30. Games will be played every Saturday from January 9 to the end of March. Each participant will receive a team shirt as well as a medal at the conclusion of the season. Divisions are separated by grade as follows. Mini Mites - Boys & Girls 1st Grade, Mighty Mites - Boys & Girls 2nd & 3rd Grade, Boy's Power Division 1 - 4th & 5th Grade, Boy's Power Division 2 - 6th & 7th Grade, Boy's Power Division 3 - 8th & 9th Grade, Girls Division - 4th, 5th, 6th & 7th Grade. For more information contact the Cottonwood Parks and Recreation Department at 928-639-3200 or email Jak Teel at jteel@cottonwoodaz.gov.
